The Salvation of the State is the Watchfulness in the Citizen

About

Indivisible Lincoln is a group of Nebraskans living in the 1st Congressional district. We are a grassroots organization run by volunteers. We organize direct interactions with elected officials to protect our community and our state from far-right legislation. We have taken inspiration from the Indivisible Guide but we have no direct connections to any other organizations.

Join the Movement

Action

The easiest way to get involved is by following our Facebook Page and joining our Facebook Discussion Group.

Not on Facebook? Send us an email and ask to be added to our email list.
